products.title: Emperor, Mushroom - Roman Blind
products.description: Generate elegance and style by including emperor in mushroom in your dcor, where a silky thread forms a chiffon-like blind with a ribbed effect. The shimmering grey shade will blend with most subdued dcor schemes for a touch comforting texture and dazzling colour. Create a cool and contemporary look in a basic white bedroom by including soothing shades of dove grey and eye-catching silver accessories.

products.title: Kent, Mulberry - Roman Blind
products.description: If one colour spells luxury, it has to be purple. So combined with the plush fabric of the kent collection, the deep berry shade of the mulberry creates a warmth and cosiness that just cannot be matched. Create a homely yet romantic feel in the living room, blending the mulberry with cream walls, dark wooden floorboards, and brushed gold finishings. Keep sofas and chairs in either purple or cream, with cushions in opposing colours, incorporating a pretty pattern if you can.

products.title: Kent, Kiwi - Roman Blind
products.description: Luscious in lime, the kent kiwi mixes a light, appetising hue with a deep pile fabric with a gorgeous chenille feel. The thick yet lightweight cloth, lined with a protective polycotton sateen, folds neatly into gentle drapes to form a perfect roman blind. Add a calming softness to the spare bedroom by centring your decor around the kiwi. Keep things light and airy by sticking to white walls and white and lime bedlinen and cushions.

products.title: Kent, Green - Roman Blind
products.description: A rich forest green, the kent green combines indoor luxury with outdoor hues. The deep feel and soft texture of the chenille-like cloth adds a gentle shimmer to this dark colour as the light hits it from different directions. Combined with the sumptuous layers of the roman blind style, this is a plush piece indeed. Dress your dining room in old-fashioned splendour by blending the green amongst patterned wallpaper, dark mahogany furniture, and cream accents.

products.title: Kent, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: With its military connotations, the colour navy is a force to be reckoned with. The classic kent fabric, with its plush, chenille texture, adds a softness and sense of cosiness to the colour, resulting in a stylish and appealing blind. Settle the navy against white or cream walls in the living room or master bedroom, matching it to other, differently textured fabrics throughout the room. Accent with a rich, saffron yellow to make the navy truly pop, and you have yourself an attractive, on-trend colour scheme.

products.title: Kent, Black - Roman Blind
products.description: For a contemporary design, with a classical finish, try the kent black. Softly stitched texturing gives it a relaxed and cosy feel, whilst the jet black shade offers a stark modern edge. The fabric falls beautifully into the soft curves of the blind, forming a look of character and depth. Modern style can be just as luxurious as traditional, so create a sumptuous monochrome mode in the living room by teaming the black with soft white walls, dove grey furnishings, and silver finishings.

products.title: Kent, Duckegg - Roman Blind
products.description: For sophisticated luxury, folded softly and neatly into the romantic drapes of a roman blind, choose the kent range. And, with its cool blue hue, the duck egg brings an extra luxe to the mix. The pretty blue of the duck egg typically works with neutral tones, such as taupes, golds, and fawns, creating an opulent, yet delicately understated, colour scheme that would look simply irresistible in a living room, dining room, or bedroom, whether in a period or contemporary home.

products.title: Kent, Wine - Roman Blind
products.description: The beautifully rich claret of the kent in wine adds cosiness and warmth wherever it goes and whatever it's paired with. It drapes neatly into its folds which, with the sewn in stability batons, are sure not to sag, and will last year upon year. Craft a traditionally styled dining room by teaming the wine with dark woods, cream paints, and gold finishings. If you're feeling extra bold, why not choose a glamorously patterned wallpaper to give the room an extra hit of colour? Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width.

products.title: Kent, Peacock - Roman Blind
products.description: Terrific in teal, the kent peacock is a bright and bold number, and the chenille-feel texturing of the fabric adds luxury and elegance. The softness of the cloth means that it falls easily into the soft arches of the roman, making for a graceful yet lavish finish. For a conventional bathroom with a difference, hang this loosely structured roman blind in the window amongst a white suite, tiling, and walls, and accessorise with matching towels and bath linen.

products.title: Kent, Chocolate - Roman Blind
products.description: Brown doesn't get much deeper, darker, or richer than the sumptuous chocolate from the chenille-textured kent collection. You'll adore the palatable hue this blind gives off, as well as the way in which it falls into the curving roman arches. Team the chocolate with softer lattes, oatmeals, and creams for a cosy and warm ambience in the living room. Opt for polished woods, whether light, medium, or dark, and use shimmering or brushed golds to add an understated sense of glamour to the room.

products.title: Kent, Earth - Roman Blind
products.description: More glamorous than its name implies, the kent earth is a gorgeously textured canvas of shimmering oatmeal that has a lovely chenille feel to it. This muted almost-gold is sure to add elegance and grace to any window, and makes an effective neutral for stronger colours. Use the earth in any colour scheme that you like. A rich teal would stand out beautifully against it, creating a gorgeous colour combination for an ensuite bathroom.

products.title: Kent, Caramel - Roman Blind
products.description: In a delicious golden tone, the kent caramel is true to its name, and its rich look is only emphasised by the soft texturing of the fabric. This sophisticated shade is sure to add class and elegance to any room in the home, and will match a wide range of stronger, bolder hues. Couple the caramel with a jet black for a contemporary yet opulent finish in a new-build's living room. You, and your guests, will love this sumptuous colour combination, which is easily accented with gold and black soft furnishings and accessories.

products.title: Allure Faux Silk Slate Roman Blind
products.description: The classic contrasting combo, black and white, can be put to good use in schemes both retro or contemporary. Slick and clean, the shimmering faux silk base takes on a metallic tone, broken up by the slubs and other natural touches youd see in real silk. Framing that brigh the classic contrasting combo, black and white, can be put to good use in schemes both retro or contemporary.

products.title: Halden Linen Limestone Roman Blind
products.description: It doesn't get much smarter or more sophisticated than this halden linen limestone roman blind. A contemporary grey fabric with lots of texture surrounded on three sides by a gorgeous charcoal skinny border. Roman blinds are superb for making a room feel softer, cosier and more it doesn't get much smarter or more sophisticated than this halden linen limestone roman blind.

products.title: Accents Linen Roman Blind
products.description: Sage is a colour thats growing in popularity, bringing a similar neutral chic as greys, with added organic appeal thanks to its natural green tone. Its used to beautiful effect here, crafted into a stylishly slim border that frames a sumptuously soft and creamy base fabric.

products.title: Accents Navy Roman Blind
products.description: Navy and cream, it's a combination that works so well and not just in a nautical theme (though we love that thought too), it's a timeless pairing that will enhance any room in your home. The lightness of the cream keeps your home feeling bright and spacious while the dark navy ad navy and cream, it's a combination that works so well and not just in a nautical theme (though we love that thought too), it's a timeless pairing that will enhance any room in your home.

products.title: Accents Bisque Roman Blind
products.description: Smart, stylish and serene, this accents bisque roman blind will add plenty of softness to your home. Taking their popular cavendish cream fabric and adding a smart, thin border to three sides adds even more sophistication. This versatile little number is suitable for any room in th smart, stylish and serene, this accents bisque roman blind will add plenty of softness to your home.

products.title: Bernal Dove Roman Blind
products.description: Struggling to choose between two shades, two patterns or even two textures? Their bordered roman blinds make it easier by letting you have both. And the bernal dove roman blind ticks all of the boxes. By teaming tonal greys fabric, one with a lovely textured weave and the other struggling to choose between two shades, two patterns or even two textures? Their bordered roman blinds make it easier by letting you have both.

products.title: Elan Cosmo Roman Blind
products.description: Dark and sumptuous, the elan cosmo roman blind brings a mature and masculine look to your room. Theres plenty of texture and a touch pattern too, which brings home a softer side. But what we love the most about this blind is the energy it exudes, whilst still having the abil dark and sumptuous, the elan cosmo roman blind brings a mature and masculine look to your room.

products.title: Eclissi Charcoal Roman Blind
products.description: Talk about sophistication. The eclissi charcoal roman blind is suave, moody and ever so sumptuous thanks to the combination of textured charcoal fabric and gentle grey borders. This blind helps to bring a softer side to a dark colour scheme, whilst the contrasting grey shades talk about sophistication.

products.title: Kent, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: Traditional meets contemporary in the kent charcoal, with its classic chenille-like texture and modern lead grey hue. The unity works beautifully though, forming a rich and luxurious roman blind that you won't want to miss out on. Settle the charcoal amongst a monochromatic colour scheme for modern chic in the dining room. Or, if you love a splash of colour, team with a bright teal for a contemporary and striking tonal look, whether in the living room or master bedroom.

products.title: Highland, Duckegg - Roman Blind
products.description: The rural checks of the highland duck egg are perfect country fare. The soft aqua blue creates a beautiful base for the multi-dimensional lines to cross, and the end result is one that would look at home in any country-style home. Hang the duck egg in the hallway to add a gentle yet effective burst of colour to neutral walls, giving guests an instant hit of rustic style as soon as they walk in. Complement with similar tones but avoid too much matching - this is rural eclecticism after all.

products.title: Highland, Sky - Roman Blind
products.description: The pastel aqua blue of the highland in sky sits pretty against the soft oatmeal and rich cream accents, interjected occasionally by a dark midnight blue and a gentle chocolate brown, whilst the soft tweed fabric emphasises the pretty checked patterning. If you love rich country style but need a little light in your life, the sky would be perfect for your living room. Paint the walls cream, and use browns and duck eggs throughout the room to bring out the hues in the blind.

products.title: Highland, Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: The ultimate in country neutrals, the highland in natural blends rich, creamy biscuit and camel shades for a gorgeously toned effect. This luxe roman blind is ideal for a rural home and will really bring out your love of the country. Surround the natural with similar cream and beige tones, as well as some deeper barky browns and grass and forest greens. Add the occasional print of an animal sketch, such as stags and rabbits, and you have the perfect cosy living room or master bedroom look.

products.title: Highland, Hunter - Roman Blind
products.description: True to its name, the highland hunter allows a deep hunter green to take centre stage in this checked, tweed blind. It sits amidst muddy browns and mustard greens, with the occasional dash of bright rose red, making it a truly country offering. Give the hunter a home in your study or den, where the dark colours will give the room a moody yet cosy feel, and the warmth of the fabric will add homeliness.

products.title: Emilia Embroidered Grey Roman Blind
products.description: If your style is a little more refined then look no further than this delightful emilia embroidered grey roman blind from tuiss. The delicate blossoms are stitched into a mid grey fabric to create a stunning floral pattern. The flashes of bright white give balance and shade to a if your style is a little more refined then look no further than this delightful emilia embroidered grey roman blind from tuiss.
